_comment: getHistoryListPaged -- find all Citation CJ3+ transactions (full sales and leases, preowned only, no internal) between 8/22/2025 and 2/18/2026. Use case: broker or analyst researching comparable sales activity for a model segment.

history.description: Sold from AMW Aero to Awaiting Documentation

notes: transtype request values are CATEGORIES, not exact strings -- 'FullSale' matches 'Full Sale - Retail to Retail', 'Full Sale - Retail to Unidentified', etc.
isinternaltrans and isnewaircraft are tristate strings: 'Yes', 'No', 'Ignore'
maxpages: 0 / currentpage: 0 when results fit in one call -- NOT an error (same quirk as getBulkAircraftExport)
transtype in the RESPONSE is a full descriptive string: 'Full Sale - Retail to Retail', 'Full Sale - Retail to Leasing Company', 'Lease - Leasing Company to Retail'
companyrelationships uses NESTED schema (company:{}, contact:{}) with relationtype -- same as getRelationships
relationtype values in history: 'Seller', 'Purchaser', 'Operator', "Seller's Broker", "Purchaser's Broker"
soldprice and askingprice are often null -- JETNET reports prices where available but many deals are confidential
transretail: true = arm's length retail transaction (use for comparable sales analysis)
internaltrans: false = not an intra-company transfer (filter this for real market transactions)
newac: 'preowned' or 'new' -- maps to isnewaircraft filter in the request
transdate = actual transaction date (ISO); actiondate = when JETNET last updated this record (ISO)
pageurl links to JETNET Evolution web app detail page -- useful for customer-facing deep links
listdate = when aircraft was listed for sale; purchasedate = when it entered current owner's fleet
Use allrelationships: true to get all parties (Seller, Purchaser, Brokers) in one response
